participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Reflective and a bit anxious, Jason often thinks about his future while dealing with his present circumstances.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, Lily loves to explore her surroundings and create stories with her toys.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i have a pet turtle. i'm four.
